About.title: About Me
About.intro: Hello! I am emmm, a frontend developer who loves technology.
About.description: I am passionate about exploring the infinite possibilities of Web development, especially the React ecosystem and modern frontend toolchains. This blog is a place for me to record study notes, share technical insights, and showcase personal projects.
